name: Ambassador cert issues
details:
To confirm results from the debug bundle run the following commands:

# kubectl get secret ambassador-tls-origin -o 'go-template={{ index .data "tls.crt"}}'|base64 -d|diff /cvpi/tls/certs/ambassador.crt -
# kubectl get secret ambassador-tls-origin -o 'go-template={{ index .data "tls.crt"}}'|base64 -d|openssl x509 -noout -enddate

scan.details: Checks for not yet valid, expired or mismatching ambassador certificates and secrets.
steps: Compare the certificate and secret contents (live only)
Check log files for error messages caused by expired ambassador certificates
